Combining luminescence spectroscopy, parallel factor analysis and quantum chemistry to reveal metal speciation – a case study of uranyl( vi) hydrolysis †
†Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Calculated excitation spectra (including 2 : 2 complex) and atomic coordinates used for TD-DFT. See DOI: 10.1039/c4sc02022g
